content: I encounter dagger in hovering code hint when trying to implement a Lazy Monad

it means that although the variable is available in the context, it has an inaccessible name - writing that name directly won't work but other tactics that can access names indirectly like assumption will still work
if you want to name it, you need to adjust the syntax that was used to introduce the name in the first place, for example putting fun x => .. instead of fun _ => ..
Erika Su has marked this topic as resolved.
